text: is a Japanese women's professional shogi player ranked 4-dan. She is the current president of the . ==Women's Shogi Professionals Association== Yamada was elected president of the for the first time in June 2017, and re-elected to another two-year term in June 2019. ==Promotion history== Yamada's promotion history is as follows: *1982, April 20: 2-kyū *1983, April 1: 1-dan *1990, February 28: 2-dan *2000, April 1: 3-dan *2014, September 29: 4-dan Note: All ranks are women's professional ranks. ==Titles and other championships== Yamada has appeared in major titles match twice, but has yet to win a major title. She unsuccessfully challenged for the 12th title in 1989, the 22nd title in 2014. ==References== ==External links== * ShogiHub: Yamada, Kumi Category:Japanese shogi players Category:Living people Category:Female professional shogi players Category:Professional shogi players from Gunma Prefecture Category:People from Ōta, Gunma Category:1967 births
title: Kumi Yamada
